name: 2D Platformer Tutorial Build
description:
2D Platformer Project
Ideas to implement
1. UI Changes
2. Level 2 will be a level focused on platforming on the moving platforms above a pool of acid

3. Level 3 will be a multiple door/key level, where you must find multiple keys to progress through the level

4.  Possible Level 4, where player is chased by enemies they cannot attack and must progress while being chased.

5. New item that takes away health points when touched. 

Created by Elijah Medina
